description:
After stopping a fatal battle with Hajime Saito, a top government official asks Kenshin`s help in killing a shadowy assassin who`s threatening the future of the regime.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukushuu no Akki: Shishio Makoto no Bouryaku
İntikam Almaya Gelen Şeytan: Makoto Shishio`nun Oyunu
แผนแก้แค้นของปีศาจร้ายชิชิโอะ มาโคโตะ
復讐の悪鬼・志々雄真実の謀略
